name: Susans-requiem
tagline: Modern fantasy novel, Dresden files fan-fiction.
body:
# Susans-Requiem
**A modern fantasy book series**

_The project source is available by clicking top left "fork me on github" or the github link at bottom._

Welcome to my first attempt at writing anything. Like. Ever.
This first book is written using LaTeX. The application is available for everything from phones to tablets to computers usually for free.

This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License

I am just adding a repository on github to make the source generally available to fork or review. This work is not even close to draft yet and massive amounts of the source is due to be slashed and replaced.

![Going home](https://www.colourbox.com/preview/8770055-soldier-and-gun-in-silhouette-shot.jpg)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
